description: Try our easy to follow Chargrilled Balsamic Steak with Cauliflower Puree recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Seafood free,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,High fibre,Soy free,Wheat free,Cauliflower,Peanut free
name: Chargrilled Balsamic Steak with Cauliflower Puree Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 small cauliflower, trimmed, cut into small florets
0.75 cup light thickened cream (normal cream can be a substitute)

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a saucepan of water to the boil. Add cauliflower and cook for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Transfer to a food processor and add parmesan and cream. Process until smooth and creamy. Season to taste.
Bring a small saucepan of water to the boil. Add beans and cook for 2 minutes or until just tender.

Heat a frying pan over mediumhigh heat. Season steaks. Cook steaks for 4 minutes on each side for medium rare or until cooked to your liking. Add the balsamic vinegar and turn the steaks until they're evenly coated in vinegar.
Drain vegetables and spoon pur√©e onto serving plates. Top with steaks. Spoon over pan juices. Serve with beans.
